column4: why I agree it might have seemed a bit spammy, he was definitely someone we should have been embracing instead of turning away
this is not the right place to be putting these kind of messages. If he really was from Valve he wouldn't have used mibbit and would have adhered to the rules set for the channel.
why? sales and hr people are dumb as hell

watch the language. They know how to use IRC, i've spoken with some of them before. And the mailing list is still a much better option. Getting offtopic here, so lets move to #Ubuntu-offtopic or drop the topic.
